author: Special Correspondent
text: A school teacher, M. Rajkumar (34), was duped of Rs.32,639 by an unidentified caller who made him give details of his debit card, including its PIN, here on Tuesday. Police said the victim had assumed that manager of the bank had called him and gave all the details. He found that the money from his account vanished. It was later found that someone had made online purchase in New Delhi.
title: Teacher duped by unidentified caller
